page.description: Determines the current data entry mode of the pointer.
page.discussion: The .Mode_Get() method determines the current data entry mode of the pointer. Limitations, Desktop applications only.
page.example: dim tbl as P dim fr as P tbl = table.open("invoice_header") fr = tbl.rules_get() ? fr.mode_get() = 0 fr.change_begin() ? fr.mode_get() = 1 fr.change_end(.t.) tbl.close()
